feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:28 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -14.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 6:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -14.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -18.9°C
Wind: N 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
